comforts.general.autouse.tooltip: 設定為 true 時，放置時會自動使用睡袋
comforts.general.wellrested.tooltip: 設定為 true 以防止睡眠，視您先前睡眠的時間而定
comforts.general.sleepyratio:
Sleepy Factor
comforts.general.sleepyratio.tooltip=If well rested is true, this value is used to determine how long you need before being able to sleep again (larger numbers = can sleep sooner)
comforts.general.resthammocks.tooltip: Set to true to enable relaxing in hammocks without sleeping
comforts.general.nighthammocks.tooltip: 設定為 true 以啟用在晚上使用吊床睡覺
comforts.general.sleepingbagdebuffs.tool: List of debuffs to apply to players after using the sleeping bag - Format: [effect] [duration(secs)] [power]
comforts.general.bagbreakperc.tooltip: 睡袋在使用後毀壞的機率
comforts.general.toughasnails.tooltip: Integration features with Tough as Nails
comforts.general.toughasnails.warmbody.t: Set to true to prevent sleeping depending on how long you previously slept
